gitlet

Class Commit

  • java.lang.Object
    • gitlet.Commit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Commit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that keeps track of file changes. Includes information about the changes, unique SHA1 ID's for the changes, and information about where the changes lie in the work tree.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Commit()
      Constructs an initial commit object by calling the two argument constructor below.
      Commit(java.lang.String msg, Commit parent)
      Creates a new commit object with some message and some parent.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the current Commit's blobs
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns the current Commit's ID
      java.lang.String getMsg()
      Returns the current Commit's message
      Commit getParent()
      Returns the current Commit's parent (the commit which came just before this Commit in the work tree)

      Returns the current Commit's timestamp

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Commit

        public Commit()
        Constructs an initial commit object by calling the two argument constructor below. This commit has a message of "Initial commit." and a null parent object.

      • Commit

        public Commit(java.lang.String msg,
              Commit parent)
        Creates a new commit object with some message and some parent. Generates a timestamp (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss) from the SimpleDateFormat class, creates a new HashMap "blobs" to keep track of file names/ID's, and generates the commit object's ID from the Utils:SHA1 function Also creates a .gitlet/commits/ directory to store serialised files
        Parameters:
        msg - - a String describing the file changes made
        parent - - the Commit object that came just before this one in the work tree

    • Method Detail

      • getBlobs

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getBlobs()
        Returns the current Commit's blobs
        Returns:
        the HashMap belonging to the current commit which maps File names to File IDs

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Returns the current Commit's ID
        Returns:
        the SHA1 value associated with the current commmit

      • getMsg

        public java.lang.String getMsg()
        Returns the current Commit's message
        Returns:
        the message associated with the current commit

      • getParent

        public Commit getParent()
        Returns the current Commit's parent (the commit which came just before this Commit in the work tree)
        Returns:
        the parent of the current commit

      • getTimestamp

        public java.lang.String getTimestamp()
        Returns the current Commit's timestamp
        Returns:
        the String timestamp associated with the current commit
